tn.ref: David was clothed with a robe of fine linen, as were the Levites who carried the ark, the singers, and Kenaniah, the leader of the song with the singers

This is the name of a man. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.text: AT: "So a great crowd of Israelites brought the ark of the covenant of Yahweh from the house of Obed Edom to Jerusalem" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])

tn.ref: the ark of the covenant of Yahweh came to the city of David
tn.text: AT: "the people brought the ark of the covenant of Yahweh to the city of David" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
This is the name of David's wife. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
